description: JHipster is a Yeoman generator which is used to rapidly create a Spring Boot and Angular JS project. JHipster leverages best of class technologies to build modern web applications. Spring Boot is used on the server side to provide a robust and performance Java stack, coupled with Angular JS and Bootstrap CSS for a modern, mobile-first front end. Learn how Yeoman, Bower, Gulp, and Gradle are used to build and manage project resources.

title: Devoxx Poland 2016 - John Thompson - Getting Hip with JHipster
